HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: PPL: 99 Kč, ČP Balíkovna na adresu: 109 Kč, GLS: 99 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 1999 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Processing time is 3-4 business days. Delivery is typically the next business day after dispatch.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: PPL Výdejní místa: 69 Kč, ČP Balíkovna: 79 Kč, Zásilkovna: 89 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 1999 Kč.

SUMMARY: The e-shop offers home delivery, parcel shop delivery, and in-store pickup within the Czech Republic. Home delivery is handled by PPL, Česká pošta, and GLS, with prices from 99 Kč to 109 Kč. Parcel shop options include PPL Parcelshop, Česká pošta Balíkovna, and Zásilkovna, with prices from 69 Kč to 89 Kč. In-store pickup is available at several locations in Prague and one in Kralupy nad Vltavou for a fee of 20 Kč. Free shipping is available for all delivery methods on orders over 1999 Kč. The order processing time is 3-4 business days, with delivery typically taking an additional business day. NOTABLE FEATURES: Free shipping threshold of 1999 Kč applies to all delivery methods. In-store pickup is available on weekends at several locations. There is a size/weight limit for Zásilkovna (5 kg, sum of sides 150 cm). WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated 'Platba a doručení' page. It details providers, pricing, and free shipping conditions. However, it lacks information on COD (cash on delivery), express delivery options, and does not explicitly mention parcel lockers. Delivery time is split into processing and shipping, which is helpful.
